mapper.sql: id, event_code, device_id, circuit_no, time, serial_no, type
mapper.select: select de.* from device_event de ,device d WHERE de.`device_id` = d.`id` AND electric_box_id = #{electricBoxId} limit #{page.index} ,#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into device_event (id, event_code, device_id, circuit_no, time, serial_no, type, pair) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{circuitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pair,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into device_event
id,
event_code,
device_id,
circuit_no,
time,
serial_no,
type,
pair,

mapper.update:
update device_event
event_code = #{eventCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
circuit_no = #{circuitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pair = #{pair,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device_event set event_code = #{eventCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, circuit_no = #{circuitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pair = #{pair,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device_event set event_code = #{eventCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, circuit_no = #{circuitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
